about_the_game: Try this crazy and fast ride in the twilight. Epic Roller Coasters is a game with themed and realistic roller coasters with three different modes: casual, race and shooter. You can choose companions to go with on the rides and even take selfies and photos to share on social medias. It is fun for the whole family and friends!
